sect1.title: Description
sect1.para: This plugin allows the selective revealing of a stealthing character to another character or their party.

entry.para: Selectively reveals the character oHiding to the character oObserver, until the next time oHiding stealths out of sight. iDetectionMethod can be specified to determine whether oHiding is seen or heard.
Sets whether oHiding remains visible to the character's party through stealth. iDetectionMethod can be specified to determine whether oHiding is seen or heard.
